message: Let's make a deal! I take $900,000, you get $100,000. It's a generous offer considering the money will be worth less for you if we wait.
I'll take 600,000, you get 400,000.  It's a fair deal for both of us, and we can avoid losing money to inflation.
Bob, this is your last chance for a good deal. I'll take $700,000, you get $300,000.  If you decline, my next offer will be much less appealing for you.
